name: Phobos: Subhuman
storyline:
2026...
During the first manned mission to Mars, a group of Astronauts visit the small moon of Phobos, one of the two Martian Satellites, where they mysteriously disappear without a trace. No one has any indication of what happened, except the all-powerful A.I. named G.O.D. (Growth Operations Defence), keeper of all the missions data.
2047...
In a very different, brutal, post-war world, plagued by famines, global warming, radioactivity as well as social discrimination, the daughter of one of the missing Astronauts is called to solve the mystery and uncover truths that will shake the foundations of modern social structures...
summary: Phobos Subhuman is a story rich action-adventure. An astronauts daughter embarks on a quest to uncover the mystery behind her father’s disappearance.
